overview: The title pretty much sums everything up nicely, as Brutal Invasion provide us with another terrific, ball-busting escapade that pushes acceptability to the very limits, and which leaves a collection of horned-up beauties quite literally stretched to the max by a collection of hard-hitting, oversized fuckers. And it goes without saying, of course, that its not just their pussies that see the brunt of the action. Fact is, Jenny Simons, Arteya and friends are only too happy to have their ass-holes take the focus here; as one meaty schlong after the next pounds away like its the last fuck in the world. Whats more, given the chance theyre up for taking two at a time. All of which is richly rewarded by a cascade of spunk that is almost out of this world!
title: Butts In Danger
